dcterms:description: The UP-Fall dataset is specially designed for fall detection, comprising a diverse range of activities and trials to facilitate comprehensive analysis. It includes 11 distinct activities and six activities of daily living (ADLs), with each activity being performed three times. The dataset utilizes various sensors, including accelerometers, gyroscopes, EEG sensors, and vision devices, to capture visual data and provide a visual understanding of the environment.
dcterms:title: UP-Fall dataset
